hackathon-description-text: Join us for a marathon of creativity in Boyle Heights, Los Angeles. Get ready for 24 hours of innovation! Learn about Virtual Reality, Arduinos, Web Development, and 3D Printing! Design & build cool projects with your friends and then present them to the community.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: 8 students will receive a ticket to tour the SpaceX HQ!
The team with the most futuristic idea will win a chance to tour will.i.am's HQ, also known as "The Future".
Special Prize of a Moxtra Onesie :)

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=2228 East 4th Street, Los Angeles, CA 90033, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How much effort did the hacker/team put forth in completing their project?
How futuristic is the thinking involved with this project?

hackathon-location-address: 2228 East 4th Street, Los Angeles, CA 90033, USA
hackathon-description-header: A Marathon of High School Innovation in Boyle Heights
